rules.ruleString: (Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ARC2002, IAR2113} or  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {IAR2115})
(Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {PPR3108} and  Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {PPR2110})
Must be enrolled in course version {2126%, 2136%, F3001%}

description: This unit introduces students to the range of practical, fiscal, operational and legislated requirements for operation as a competent professional practitioner of interior architecture. Site visits relevant to the projects are undertaken.
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
